column9: IF THERE ARE MULTIPLE BILLS FOR ONE DISTRIBUTOR IN A SINGLE DAY, COMBINE THE PURCHASES HERE.

column10: If the bill includes a delivery charge, please enter it into the box.

column9: To guarantee uniform distribution of the charge across affected items, be sure to enter unit amounts for liqours.

column10: If TYPE = d then enter the barrel fraction. For example enter "2" or "1/2" for 1/2 barrel.
For other alcohol (and drafts as well) enter the number of OZ with 1 decimal place.
If item is old: U or UPDATE. If the item is new: N or NEW.

column9: SAVE THE SHEET AS 'Bill.csv' IN ORDER TO BE COMPATIBLE WITH THE PARSER BY DEFAULT.
